response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's worth more than $10,000 to us. Considering its immense potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic investment opportunity that aligns well with your financial goals. I trust this offer will be beneficial for both of us. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
